resources.string: (This can be found near your name on the paper schedule)

Your shifts are fetched by your badge number inside the database. Please note that no other information is being collected about you when you use this app. If you have any questions and/or concerns feel free to read through the Privacy Policy.
Something went wrong. Please try to login again. If this is a common issue, please let developer know.
You can select a date on the calendar to view your shift for that day.
